definition: to grant/to give/to bestow/to act/to carry out
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: John the Baptist was faithful, but he was beheaded.
sentences.chinese: 施洗約翰也盡忠，下場卻是被斬首。

sentences.english: John was the forerunner to Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 施洗約翰是耶穌的開路先鋒。

sentences.english: Perhaps while Jesus was in Cana he received word that John the Baptist had been arrested.
sentences.chinese: 也許耶穌還在迦拿的時候就聽到施洗約翰被捕的消息。

sentences.english: it was that John misunderstood what God was going to do.
sentences.chinese: 而是施洗約翰還沒明白神做事的步驟。

sentences.english: What things did John the Baptist make clear about himself?
sentences.chinese: 施洗約翰對關於他自己的什麼事情明說而不隱瞞？

sentences.english: Woman whose dancing beguiled herod into giving her the head of john the baptist.
sentences.chinese: 通過跳舞誘使希律王給她施洗約翰人頭的女子。

sentences.english: It ends with a 1519 portrait of King Francis I as Saint John the Baptist.
sentences.chinese: 以一五一九年弗朗西斯一世施洗約翰造型的畫像結束。

sentences.english: John was beheaded by Herod the tetrarch.
sentences.chinese: 施洗約翰是耶穌的開路先鋒。

sentences.english: John told every one who Jesus was.
sentences.chinese: 施洗約翰告訴所有的人耶穌是誰。

sentences.english: It is just that John misunderstood.
sentences.chinese: 只不過施洗約翰還不明白。
